entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:59 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
